name: MarketHATCH Rebates
tag_list: markethatch, pharmacy-program, medicaid-drug-rebate-program, pharmaceutical-program, pharmaceutical-rebates, patient-programs, medicaid-rebates, patient-acquisition, pharma-program
overview:
MarketHATCH specializes in turnkey coupon and rebate patient acquisition programs materials. With a 15 year track record of success, MarketHATCH assists manufacturers in effectively growing patient acquisition. MarketHATCH patient acquisition programs benefit all parties involved from patient, to provider, to pharmacist and finally to manufacturer. The programs motivate patients to be active participants in their healthcare and improve patient medication compliance with lower drug acquisition costs. We help build lasting relationships with your patients by offering patients coupons, buy downs, vouchers or cards for discounted medication. Manufacturers benefit by effectively and effortlessly capturing data and increasing compliance.

Visit http://www.markethatchrebates.com/ for more details or call 800.858.9395 to schedule a demonstration
